Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Responsabile Scientifico per l'assegno di ricerca AdR866/07 dell'Università degli Studi di Verona, per esigenze di ricerca nel Settore Scientifico-Disciplinare SECS-S/06 METODI MATEMATICI DELL’ECONOMIA E DELLE SCIENZE ATTUARIALI E FINANZIARIE per l’attuazione del seguente programma di ricerca: “Convertible bonds: Hedging made viable and reliable” (Assegnista: Dott.ssa Angelica Gianfreda). Relativo al 2008-49 Working Paper "Risk adjustment, investment policy, and valuation for an unlevered firm" [http://dse.univr.it/workingpapers/WP49.pdf, ISSN: 2036-2919 (paper), 2036-4679 (online)].

Bocconi University. Researcher (Options / Dynamic Asset Allocation) for the Centre for Applied Research in Finance (CAREFIN), Milan, Italy, CAREFIN RESEARCHERS SITE: http://www.carefin.unibocconi.eu/index.php?method=section&id=2219. RESEARCH PROJECT 1: (https://ssrn.com/abstract=1600232) "Revisiting Corporate Growth Options in the Presence of State-Dependent Cashflow Risk" (with Marco Caliari); RESEARCH PROJECT 2: (https://ssrn.com/abstract=1798636) "Reaching Nirvana with a Defaultable Asset?" (with Anna Battauz).

Associazione Bancaria Italiana (ABI). Researcher (sovereign default risk) and Scientific Committee Member for The ABI Country Risk Forum, http://countryriskforum.abi.it/CRF/default.aspx. RESEARCH PROJECT: "Sovereign-Default Risk Scoring: The ABI Country Risk Compass".

Bocconi University. Researcher (Energy Market Abuses) for the Centre Research on Analysis and Systematic Use of Information (ELEUSI), Milan, ELEUSI RESEARCHERS SITE: http://www.eleusi.unibocconi.it/wps/wcm/ connect/cdr/centro_eleusi/home/people/re searchers RESEARCH PROJECT: (http://www.iefe.unibocconi.it/wps/allegatiCTP/iefe_annual%20report_2009.pdf, p. 7) "Market abuses in energy derivatives markets" (with Emanuele Borgonovo, Giuseppe Buglione, and Guido Cervigni) in collaboration with the "Istituto di Economia delle Fonti di Energia" (IEFE, Institute of the Economics of Energy Sources), IEFE is the Center for Research on Energy and Environmental Economics and Policy at University Luigi Bocconi of Milan.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: RESEARCH THEME & GROUP [PARTICIPANT]: “Recovery Forms for Structural Models of Corporate Default” with R. Guha (Alpamayo Capital Management Ltd). OUTPUT 1: Guha, Rajiv and Sbuelz, Alessandro, Structural Recovery of Face Value at Default (December 3, 2005). Available at SSRN: https://ssrn.com/abstract=869366 or http://dx.doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.869366 (presented at the 2004 GRETA Conference Validation of Credit Risk Models in Venice). OUTPUT 2: Guha, Rajiv and Sbuelz, Alessandro, Structural Rfv: Fundamental Credit Risk Pricing and Hedging with Recovery of Face Value at Default (February 25, 2003). EFA 2003 Annual Conference Paper No. 839. Available at SSRN: https://ssrn.com/abstract=424304 or http://dx.doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.424304 (presented at the 2003 EFA Meetings in Glasgow). OUTPUT 3: Guha, R., & Sbuelz, A. (2003). Structural RFV: Recovery Form and Defaultable Debt Analysis. (CentER Discussion Paper; Vol. 2003-37; ISSN 0924-7815). Tilburg: Finance. https://pure.uvt.nl/portal/files/545611/37.pdf.

RESEARCH THEME & GROUP [PARTICIPANT]: “Optimal Dynamic Asset Allocation with Predictable Returns” with R. Koijen (NYU Stern School of Business) and J.C. Rodríguez (Tilburg University). OUTPUT 1: KOIJEN R., RODRIGUEZ J.C., SBUELZ A (2009). Momentum and Mean Reversion in Strategic Asset Allocation. MANAGEMENT SCIENCE, vol. 55, p. 1199-1213, ISSN: 0025-1909, doi: http://dx.doi.org/10.1287/mnsc.1090.1006. OUTPUT 2: RODRIGUEZ J, SBUELZ A (2006). Understanding and exploiting momentum in stock returns. In: (a cura di): Luc Renneboog (Editor), Advances in Corporate Finance and Asset Pricing. p. 485-504, Bingley: Emerald Group Publishing Limited, ISBN: 0444527230.

RESEARCH THEME & GROUP [PARTICIPANT]: “Pricing Credit-Sensitive Securities” with L. Campi (London School of Economics) and S. Polbennikov (Quantitative Portfolio Strategy Group, Barclays). OUTPUT 1: CAMPI L, POLBENNIKOV S, SBUELZ A (2009). Systematic Equity-Based Credit Risk: A CEV Model with Jump to Default. JOURNAL OF ECONOMIC DYNAMICS & CONTROL, vol. 33, p. 93-108, ISSN: 0165-1889, doi: http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jedc.2008.03.011. OUTPUT 2: CAMPI L, SBUELZ A (2005). Revisiting corporate growth options in the presence of state-dependent cashflow risk. EUROPEAN JOURNAL OF OPERATIONAL RESEARCH, vol. 220, p. 286-294, ISSN: 0377-2217, doi: http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.ejor.2011.10.003.

OUTPUT: Gianfreda A., Sbuelz A. (2009) "Risk adjustment, investment policy, and valuation for an unlevered firm" [http://dse.univr.it/workingpapers/WP49.pdf, ISSN: 2036-2919 (paper), 2036-4679 (online)].

RESEARCH THEME & GROUP [PARTICIPANT]: “Continuation Regions for American Options” with A. Battauz (Bocconi University) and De Donno (University of Parma). OUTPUT 1: Battauz A, De Donno M, Sbuelz A (2015). Real options and American derivatives: The double continuation region. MANAGEMENT SCIENCE, vol. 61, p. 1094-1107, ISSN: 0025-1909, doi: 10.1287/mnsc.2013.1891. OUTPUT 2: A. BATTAUZ, DE DONNO M., SBUELZ A (2012). Real options with a double continuation region. QUANTITATIVE FINANCE, vol. 12, p. 465-475, ISSN: 1469-7688, doi: http://dx.doi.org/10.1080/14697688.2010.484024.

RESEARCH THEME & GROUP [PARTICIPANT]: “Closed-form Asset Pricing in Continuous-Time with Mean-Reverting Fundamentals” with F. Mignanego (Catholic University of Milan). OUTPUT: Mignanego F, Sbuelz A (2012). Analytical cyclical price-dividend ratios. In: WORKING PAPER N. 12/2, DIPARTIMENTO DI DISCIPLINE MATEMATICHE, FINANZA MATEMATICA ED ECONOMETRIA, UNIVERSITA' CATTOLICA DEL SACRO CUORE DI MILANO. p. 1-37, Milano:Vita&Pensiero, ISBN: 978-88-343-2294-9.

RESEARCH THEME & GROUP [PARTICIPANT]: “Convex-Duality Methods and Optimal Dynamic Allocation” with A. Battauz (Bocconi University) and De Donno (University of Parma). OUTPUT: Battauz A, De Donno M, SBUELZ ALESSANDRO (2015). Kim and Omberg Revisited: The Duality Approach. JOURNAL OF PROBABILITY AND STATISTICS, vol. 2015, Volume 2015, Article ID 581854, 6 pages, ISSN: 1687-952X, doi: 10.1155/2015/581854.

RESEARCH THEME & GROUP [PARTICIPANT]: “Entropy-Based Methods in Asset Pricing and Investments” with A. Ghosh (Carnegie Mellon, Pittsburgh), C. Julliard (London School of Economics), and A. Tarelli (Bocconi University). Originated from my participation to the two invitation-only European Summer Symposia in Financial Markets (ESSFM, Asset Pricing Week) organized by the Center for Economic Policy Research (CEPR) in Gerzensee (CH) in July 2015 and July 2016. 2015 ESSFM: www.szgerzensee.ch/research/confer ences/esset-essfm-essim/essfm-2015/ 2016 ESSFM: www .szgerzensee.ch/research/conferences/ess et-essfm-essim/essfm-2016/ OUTPUT: Forthcoming.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: [INCARICO DI INSEGNAMENTO] Instructor of one module of the course "Corporate Finance" in the BSc in Financial Economics Programme, Department of Economics, Birkbeck College, University of London, London (UK).
[INCARICO DI RICERCA] Research Fellow for the project "Finance and Consumption in The European Union", Department of Economics, European University Institute
[INCARICO DI RICERCA] Assistant Professor, https://pure.uvt.nl/portal/e n/persons/a-sbuelz(1323b65f-baf9-4b93-90 a2-a0e9f7206d7e)/publications.html. Department of Finance, Tilburg University (NL)

[INCARICO DI INSEGNAMENTO] Instructor of the course "Corporate Finance II" (mandatory course for the 2nd-year students of the B.Sc. in Business Studies, International Business Program) during the academic years 1999-2000, 2000-01, 2001-02, 2002-03, 2003-04, and 2004-05. Department of Finance, Tilburg University, Tilburg (NL). In the Summer of 2004, I was awarded a Teaching Quality Recognition (‘Intensive’ Label) from the International Business Board for the "Corporate Finance II" course.

[INCARICO DI RICERCA] Research Fellow at the Center for Economic Research (CentER); https://pure.uvt.nl/ws/files/537452/112.pdf; https://pure.uvt.nl/ws/files/543644/102.pdf; https://pure.uvt.nl/ws/files/545917/64.pdf; https://pure.uvt.nl/portal/files/545611/37.pdf. Tilburg University (NL)

[INCARICO DI INSEGNAMENTO] Instructor of the course "Finance I" (mandatory course for the 1st-year students of the B.Sc. in Business Studies) during the academic years 2002-03 and 2003-04. Department of Finance, Tilburg University, Tilburg (NL).

[INCARICO DI INSEGNAMENTO] Instructor of the course "Option Theory" (elective course for the B.Sc. in Business Studies {general and International Business Program}, and for the B.Sc. Program in Econometrics) during the academic years 2002-03, 2003-04, and 2004-05. Department of Finance, Tilburg University, Tilburg (NL).

[INCARICO DI INSEGNAMENTO] Instructor of the course "Seminar in International Business" (Finance Track, elective course for the B.Sc. in BUsiness Studies, International Business Program) during the academic years 2002-03, 2003-04, and 2004-05. Department of Finance, Tilburg University, Tilburg (NL).

[INCARICO DI RICERCA] Research Fellow of The "Chaire Risque de Crédit" (Chairwoman: Prof. Monique Jeanblanc), Université d’Evry (Paris-Evry) in collaboration with the Fédération Bancaire Française, http://grozny.maths.univ-ev ry.fr/chaire_risque_de_credit/membresext .html
